de.frauas.jdemandmodel.reader

Class ApplianceReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.frauas.jdemandmodel.reader.CSVReader
      • de.frauas.jdemandmodel.reader.ApplianceReader

  • public class ApplianceReader
extends CSVReader
    This class reads the ApplianceData from the file "input/appliances.csv" which then can be accessed using the "get" method.
    Author:
    lukas

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApplianceReader

        public ApplianceReader()
        Creates a new ApplianceReader. The data is read in.

    • Method Detail

      • fill

        private void fill()
        In this method an ApplianceData hash map is filled, that is later used to return the data ("get"). As this class extends a CSVReader, the "getDouble" method can be used to access the read-in data. The method iterates through all devices and for each reads the single variables of ApplianceData from the row specified in in the Device class. Note that for TVs the length of the power cycle varies.

      • get

        public ApplianceData get(Device device)
        Parameters:
        device - the device of which to return the ApplianceData
        Returns:
        the ApplianceData of the specified device.
